name: Rachel Power Design
description: Bespoke interior design services in Farnham, Surrey. From single room updates to complete property redesigns, creating inspiring, joyful spaces tailored to each client's lifestyle and personality. Services include modern homes, period properties, and blending classic and contemporary elements.

itemOffered.name: Single Room Updates
itemOffered.description: Transform individual rooms with tailored design solutions that reflect your lifestyle and personality.

itemOffered.name: Complete Property Redesigns
itemOffered.description: Full home renovation and interior design services for entire properties.

itemOffered.name: Design Consultation
itemOffered.description: Professional interior design consultation including mood boards, space planning, and design development.

itemOffered.name: Period Home Renovations
itemOffered.description: Specialist interior design for listed buildings and period properties, blending historical character with modern functionality.

keywords: interior designer Farnham, interior design Surrey, period home renovation, residential interior design, bespoke interior design South East England
